seasons.title: Turning Oppression into Opportunity for Women Worldwide

episodes.synopsis: Meet some of the most courageous individuals of our time who are doing extraordinary work to empower women and girls everywhere.
episodes.title: Half the Sky: Turning Oppression Into Opportunity For Women Worldwide: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: This call to arms urges us not only to bear witness to the plight of the world's women, but to help transform their oppression into opportunity.
episodes.title: Half the Sky: Turning Oppression Into Opportunity For Women Worldwide: Part 2

video.title: Half the Sky: Turning Oppression into Opportunity for Women Worldwide
video.synopsis: Filmed in 10 countries, this series introduces women who are struggling with some of the most difficult and oppressive circumstances imaginable.
